ProjectTitle: Mechanical cardiac unloading with micro-axial flow pumps: post-implantation effects on remodelling and bleeding/thrombosis
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/04/2024
Storage/preservation: please note that onedrive is not a KU Leuven server, data is stored in a Microsoft data center and is covered by a KU Leuven license agreement. Onedrive is intended for short term storage with collaboration and is less suitable for long term storage, it is linked to your KU Leuven account which expires after you leave and you (and your supervisor) have no longer access to the data. Have a look in the storage guide for other solutions:  https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: you mention no factors restricting sharing of data, could privacy be a factor? If not, why are you sharing data as restricted data and not as open data on for example RDR? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
